snippet.title: Snares of Ruin Trailer
snippet.description:
A trailer for my soon-upcoming detective story game with romance sim mechanics and choices with consequences. You are Detective Hank Anderson, transferred to a new city to help uncover the source of a deadly disease that turns people into violent zombies. And when you go off duty, your life is surrounded by many interesting women whom you can date. Whatever you do, your relationships will have an impact on the future events.

Music in the trailer is by a good friend of mine, Joshua Curtis (Fightin Mooses). Check out more of his music if you enjoyed this song: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkPQN8L9S6XP6xZG4ElgswQ
